name: Radar
description: Radar is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES Club. With its sleek and futuristic design, Radar boasts a unique combination of traits that set it apart. Its box-shaped body resembles that of a soldier, while its arms and legs mimic the agile movements of a cat. The screen on its torso, adorned with a stylish cat graphic, displays intricate waveforms and data in real-time. Completing its look, Radar sports a pair of cool shades, adding an extra touch of charm to its overall appearance.
